title: Forum on Equality and the Digital Divide

yaml.title: Forum on Equality and the Digital Divide
yaml.subtitle: Foro Brechas y Equidad Digital
yaml.author: Martin Olmos

markdown.markdown:
::: {.content-visible when-profile="english"}

The [Forum on Equality and the Digital Divide][1] was held on June 9 and 10. In this context, I was invited to speak at the panel "Universal Access Funds in the Region: the case of Argentina."

Here I leave the full [video of my participation](https://youtu.be/x2vido6ME4M) (in Spanish):

:::

::: {.content-visible when-profile="spanish"}

El pasado 9 y 10 de junio se realizó el [Foro Brechas y Equidad Digital][1]. En ese marco me invitaron a exponer en el panel "Los Fondos de Acceso Universal en la Región: el caso de Argentina.

Aquí dejo el [video completo de mi participación](https://youtu.be/x2vido6ME4M): 

:::

[![video](foro_brechas.png){width=80%}](https://youtu.be/x2vido6ME4M)

::: {.content-visible when-profile="english"}

And my [presentation][2] (in Spanish):

:::

::: {.content-visible when-profile="spanish"}

Y mi [presentación][2]:

:::

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_url("https://martinolmos.github.io/slides/presentacion_fondos_acceso_universal#1")
```
</center>

[1]:https://foroequidaddigital.cl
[2]:https://martinolmos.github.io/slides/presentacion_fondos_acceso_universal#1
